failure_type_definitions.boilerplate: Generic risk language that appears in every filing without substance
failure_type_definitions.negation: Text describes risk mitigation or controls rather than actual risk
failure_type_definitions.hedging_language: Overly cautious legal language without material concern
failure_type_definitions.cross_reference: References other sections without substantive content
failure_type_definitions.governance: Corporate governance text mistakenly scored as risk
